column5: This is a great collection of funny clips from Fishing For the Rest of Us. It's great to see the behind the scenes of a fishing show.
Wehn I got my first boat I was convinced I would never get stuck on trees again like when I used to shore fish.  I was wrong I still fish shorelines and get snagged on trees.  Fun video  Cheers!
You seem to be a pretty good fisherman, singing and dancing? Not so much. Good luck on your fishing channel.
